modName: Khajiit Six Nipple Retexture for CBBE v3
summary: a Khajiit Retexture with six nipples for CBBE v2/3
descriptionHtml:
;;;;;;;:::...  Soul-Gryph Khajiit Six Nipple Retexture for CBBE v2/3 ...:::;;;;;;;

Install = Just drop the Data Folder in the .rar into your Skyrim Folder.

Uninstall = Delete the femalebody and femalebody_msn   .dds files from \\\\Data\\\\Textures\\\\Actors\\\\Character\\\\KhajiitFemale folder.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1_1 Update -- Fixed Vagina

 I added 4 new images showing the images of how the vagina looks in differing armors Iv endorsed threw this mod - Keep in mind that when using the Dynasty Armor exclusivly.. I have included a patch texture files to make the vagina look somewhat normal again but it only works with Dynasty Armor. This file is in the \'Khajiit 6nipples EXTRAS\' folder in your \'Data\' folder.
Which is were I will put all extra files from this mod from now on.




This is a retextured version of = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4686 by AnTiWoMaAgNoT
The changes I made were to the \\\'lower lady parts\\\', Nipples, Tail Base.
Also changed the Specular Map so the nipples would show up and her \\\'lower lady parts\\\' would look more accurate.

I have heard demand for a 6+ nippled Khajiit Texture a few times and decided this was an easy enough task for me. Keep in mind the bottom nipples wont have any areolas. I figured if Im gonna make a realistic body anatomy mod, the areolas wouldent show threw the fur.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Required Mod
One of the Caliente mods - origional - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

Suggested Mods to Run this with. - Does not require.
Regular Mods
 - Cover Khajiits - 		http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941  	- good Khajiit face textures.
 - Interesting NPCs - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8429	- its freakin awesome and I would suggest it to anyone.
-ENB Next Generation - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15826 - If your comp can handel it...I prefer the Balanced Setting. 


Sexy Mods
 - You Call That Skimpy - UNP - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11951 	- Revealing Base Armor for Females PC and NPC
 - Dynasty White Armor - CBBE v2 - Skimpy and Super Skimpy - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6983 - Works perfectly with this skin.


FOR THOSE WHO USE THE Superb ENB-RL Mod I threw in my enbseries.ini into a seperate folder.

SCREENSHOTS
These screenshots were made with 2 different but similar Khajiits. 
All 3 pre 1.1 screens were made using both Superb ENB-RL and RCRN 3.6
All 4 1.1 screens were made using ENB Next Generation(Balanced Setting) with my brightness maxed and magelight behind the character. PS: I dont usually have it maxed.
author: soulgryph
